remarks: Norm difference property of a normed complex vector space.  Problem 3 of [Kreyszig] p. 64.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvabs.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvabs.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvabs.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvabs.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvabs $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( abs ` ( ( N ` A ) - ( N ` B ) ) ) <_ ( N ` ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) ) $.
